results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) (1 <= k <= n) given by T(n,1) = T(n,n) = 1, otherwise T(n, k) = (m*n-m*k+1)*T(n-1,k-1)+(m*k-m+1)*T(n-1,k), where m = -1.
comment: For m = ...,-1,0,1,2 we get ..., A144431, A007318 (Pascal), A008292, A060187, ..., so this might be called a sub-Pascal triangle.
The triangle starts off like A098593, but is different further on.
maple: if (n=1 or k=1 or k=n) then 1 else
for n from 1 to 8 do lprint([seq(T(n,k,-1),k=1..n)]); od; # _N. J. A. Sloane_, May 08 2013
